TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bruce_Bowen, title = Bruce_Bowen, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Bowen} }

S.FORM: Bruce Bowen nalecuhan i Merced, California, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. 6 bulad 14 demiad, 1971 a mihca, Bruce Bowen, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
